review: Love my Fire TV Stick. It's very easy to use and works great.
author: joy johnston

review: I thought it would be the answer of getting rid of my expensive cable service. It wasn't.
author: Freddie F. Washington

review: It's a great little piece of tech, especially if you know how to modify it to suit your custom media needs.PROS: easy to set up, smooth user interface, excellent streaming experienceCONS: limited instant video content for non-U.S. residents, majority of videos will play only if you live in the U.S.
author: Hesed

review: I really don't know how to hook it up.
author: Patrick Alston

review: Very disappointed, lost money.After I configured WIFI connection correctly, I could not make it work, just says: "We are not unable to connect to Amazon services. Please check your Internet connection or try again later. [Go to Network Settings]. I feel cheated! Do not waste your money!
author: Edwards Ortiz

review: HI, VERY satisfied with my orders, thanks very much
author: Maria Cabral
